amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, up to $3,000,000 for the Mobile On-Scene Sensor Aircraft Intelligence Command, Control, and Computer Centers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3529 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3529 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S7380; text: CR S7380) To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, up to $3,000,000 for the Mobile On-Scene Sensor Aircraft Intelligence Command, Control, and Computer Centers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3529 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3529 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Burns.
